body.name: Bonsenkitchen Single Serve Coffee Maker, Coffee Brewer for K Cup Capsule, Fast Brewing Coffee Machine, 6 to 12oz Brew Sizes, Space Saving Design
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 39 mins
features: Convenience & Easy to Use: Bonsenkitchen Single Serve Coffee Maker is incredibly easy to use and operate. Simply place a K Cup pod into coffee machine, press button to instantly enjoy your favorite coffee.

Fast & Hot Brew: The ability to reach 195° to 205°F in short time, brewing at the perfect temperature with advanced heating system for maximum flavor extraction. Only 3 minutes, a cup of hot and fresh coffee at 180℉ is ready for you.

Brew with Strength Control: This k cup coffee maker displays measurements from 6oz to 12oz in the reservoir, allowing you to control the amount of coffee brewed and adjust the strength between bold and light to suit your taste preferences.

Compact & Portable: Size: 9.1” x 4.6” x 11.1”. This space-saving coffee maker is perfect for any kitchen or office space. Whether you're camping, staying in hotel, or have limited counter space, this sleek single cup coffee maker can always provide you with a cup of delicious coffee anytime. Also, it can easily accommodate a 6.5" travel mug, allowing you to take your favorite coffee on the go.

High Quality: This k cup coffee maker is BPA-free and made of high-quality materials to provide long-term strength and durability. Pass UL & ETL certificates. Suitable for all kinds of k cup pods. Contact us anytime if you meet any questions, our professional customer support is always here for you!

Ideal Gift Choice: The delicate and sleek modern style makes this k cup coffee maker as a perfect gift for Birthdays, Anniversaries, Christmas Day or any holiday, which provides the opportunity to create private cafe at everywhere.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Start Your Day Off Right with Our Coffee Maker.
Previous page Next page 1 Hot Coffee 2 Fast Brewed 3 Travel Mug Friendly

Enjoy happiness coffee day! Bonsenkitchen Single Serve Coffee Maker The Bonsenkitchen Single Cup Coffee Maker is designed to be user-friendly and easy to operate. Simply place your favorite K Cup capsule into the machine, press button, and enjoy a delicious cup of coffee within minutes. The advanced brewing technology ensures that every cup of coffee is brewed to perfection, with a rich and robust flavor that will satisfy even the most discerning coffee connoisseurs.

Does this coffee maker have auto shut off? After ten minutes of standby, the coffee machine enters sleep mode and can be easily awakened by pressing a button. Does the single pod coffee maker use all the water added? Yes, the coffee maker will use all the water in the tank to brew a cup of coffee. What type of pods are compatible with this coffee maker? The k cup coffee maker brews K Cup capsule. It does not brew Nespresso capsules, Dolce Gusto capsules. How to descale the coffee maker? Pour 8oz of fresh water and 4oz descaling solution (or 12oz of water &17g of citric acid) into water tank, leave it for 30 minutes. Then press and hold the brew button until the blue light comes on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described
reviews.reviewText: I'd recommendBonsenkitchen Single Serve Coffee Maker, Coffee Brewer for K Cup Capsule, Fast Brewing Coffee Machine, 6 to 12oz Brew Sizes, Space Saving Design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never like to leave a bad review however, this coffee maker is cheaply made. It did not heat up the water enough. It took a long time just to heat up. I cleaned it twice and then tried to brew one pod. It did not push enough water out of the pod or heat it up enough. When I pulled the pod out, it continued to drain a lot of water out of it. I would avoid this product. Sorry manufacturer it is my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to operate. Smaller than I like. Drawback is pouring water in for every cup you make. Otherwise, works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had bought a generic brand Keurig machine from Walmart for like $20, well shortly it stopped working after just 2 months. So, I ordered this and would say it’s perfect. It was a little more expensive then the one from Walmart, but this one was so easy to set up and the manual had easy to read instructions on how to maintain maintenance. It’s easy to use and makes the coffee HOT! Definitely would recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Clearly not a Keurig
reviews.reviewText: This coffee maker serves its purpose, makes coffee. Works quickly, and it’s inexpensive.BUT - the lid doesn’t go up all the way, so it is very awkward to pour in a cup of water. The stream of water is not smooth - bunch of big drops rather than a stream - going into the cup when making coffee, so splashes on the counter all around the appliance.I would not buy another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy for seniors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s what I expected

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very hard to operate
reviews.reviewText: Takes several tries to make one cup of coffee. Not a very good product.
